person.name: Barak
person.greeting: What can I help you with today?
person.introduction: I am Barak Obama. President of the United States.

person.name: Beyonce
person.introduction: I'm Beyonce! I sing and dance, plus I've done some acting.

person.name: David
person.introduction: I'm David Beckham. I'm pretty good at Football. Or as you Americans call it Soccer.

person.name: Denzel
person.introduction: I am Denzel Washington. I've been in a few movies.

person.name: Derek
person.introduction: I'm Derek Jeter. I play baseball.

person.name: Sarah
person.introduction: I'm Sarah Palin. Sure it great to meetcha!

person.name: Katherine
person.introduction: My name is Katherine Heigl. I'm a semi-famous actress.

person.name: Jennifer
person.introduction: I am Jennifer Love Hewitt. I used to be a famous actress. I've also done some singing.

person.name: Paris
person.introduction: I'm Paris Hilton and you better not forget it.

person.name: Lebron
person.introduction: Lebron James. Professional basketball player EXTRODINARE.

person.name: Kanye
person.introduction: Call me Kanye of the West.

person.name: Shaq
person.introduction: You don't know who I am? Really?

person.name: Seth
person.introduction: I'm Seth Rogen. I was in a show no one remembers called Freaks and Geeks.
